"specified" means UI node</message> <number>TIL0001081</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-03-31 06:52:30</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4f5b842c2fd3201051dad5f62799b62c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-06-14 12:03:44</sys_updated_on> <title>Check If Node Is UI Or Worker Node</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
